name: Candy Pairs - Kids Puzzle Game
description:
"Candy Pairs" is a puzzle game for kids carefully designed to help children improve their memory skills.

As everybody knows, matching games or pairs games are a great way to improve recognition and develop concentration while having fun.

As toddlers love both candies and puzzles, this memory game will easily take place in your kid’s daily activities. In a recent study, it has been proven that regular mental exercise can greatly improve kids memory.

How to play the great puzzles of Candy Pairs :
The game contains 5 puzzles: Easy 2×3 - Medium 3×4 - Hard 4×5 - Expert 5×6 - Genius 5×8
Each puzzle level contains a different number of candy cards and requires to be solved before the level time expires.
For each level, the player is required to tap the card buttons and memorize the candy behind in order to match its couple.

Game features :
- Colorful HD candies
- Visual memory training
- Multi levels with with growing difficulty
- Simple interface for easy use and play
- Candy Pairs is optimized for smartphones and tablets

Candy Pairs game is designed for:
- All children ages: Babies, Preschoolers, School children and Teens
- Boys and Girls
- School, Preschool and Nursery use
- Suitable for autism / autistic children
- Parents & Teachers

We advise parents to add this game into the kids mode to better control the apps your children are handling.
